message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_EMAIL_SUBJECT
message.locale: New Service Enquiry added for service %1s.

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_REQUEST_ACCESS_LINE_ONE
message.locale: You currently do not have login credentials to view this enquiry. You can select the following link to receive login credentials - %1s.

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_REQUEST_ACCESS_LINE_TWO
message.locale: When you have your login credentials you can respond by selecting the following link - %1s.

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_LINE_ONE_WITH_FREQUENCY_TIME_OF_DAY
message.locale: %1s from %2s would like to request %3s for %4n client(s), with a frequency of: %5s in the %6s from %7d

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_LINE_ONE_NO_FREQUENCY_NO_TIME_OF_DAY
message.locale: %1s from %2s would like to request %3s for %4n client(s), from %5d

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_LINE_ONE_NO_FREQUENCY_TIME_OF_DAY
message.locale: %1s from %2s would like to request %3s for %4n client(s), in the %5s from %6d

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_LINE_ONE_FREQUENCY__NO_TIME_OF_DAY
message.locale: %1s from %2s would like to request %3s for %4n client(s), with a frequency of: %5s from %6d

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_LINE_TWO
message.locale: This enquiry is marked as urgent.

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL_LINE_THREE
message.locale: Please respond by selecting the following link - %1s.

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_CASE_WORKER_RESPONSE_EMAIL_BODY
message.locale: %1s from %2s has responded to your query regarding '%3s'. Please log into the application to view the response.

message.name: INF_SERVICE_ENQUIRY_PROVIDER_RESPONSE_EMAIL_BODY
message.locale: %1s has responded to your query regarding %2s for %3n client(s). Please log into the application to view the response.

message.name: ERR_MALFORMED_VIEW_LINK_URL
message.locale: There is a problem creating the url for the view service enquiry page. This url is used in notification emails when a service enquiry is created or updated.
